import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios'; import {useState} from 'react' function SignUp() { const [signupInputValue, setSignupInputValue] = useState({ fullname: "", position: "", email: "", password: "", rol: "" }) const handleSignupInputChange = (event) => { setSignInputValue({ ...signupInputValue, [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } const register = () => { axios.post(`$user/newuser`, {...signupInputValue} ) .then(res => { console.log("user added") console.log(res.data) setResponse({...response, success: true, msg: `Hello ${res.data.fullname}! Wellcome to LabTool!` }) openResponseModal() }) .catch(error => { console.log(error) console.log("hay un error") setResponse({...response, error: true, msg: error.response.data }) openResponseModal() }); } return (
